entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0073.7648] The concept us-gaap:AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities with a value of -206,000 is used with the DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis. This element cannot be used with this axis. The allowable list of elements that can be used are as follows: - DefinedBenefitPlanActualReturnOnPlanAssetsSoldDuringPeriod, - DefinedBenefitPlanActualReturnOnPlanAssetsStillHeld, - DefinedBenefitPlanAmountOfEmployerAndRelatedPartySecuritiesIncludedInPlanAssets, -
